channel.title: Tutorial Island - Not Able to Talk
channel.description: I am making something at Tutorial Island, and every time I talk, no one can see the text. It also will not let you send PM's. I've been trying to fix this for weeks, and can not find it. I have searched every word that could be anywhere close to "tutorial island" in the server and client. Does anyone know how to fix this? I would greatly appreciate this.

item.title: Tutorial Island - Not Able to Talk
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

It IS client sided, you weren’t able to talk in tutorial island, and since we use JaGeX’s client; neither can we.

zyle1992:

is unknown to me.

Read full topic
item.source: Tutorial Island - Not Able to Talk

item.title: Tutorial Island - Not Able to Talk
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“buut15, post:3, topic:423610”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=526235.msg3832712#msg3832712 date=1322696495]
It’s in the client. You’re not supposed to be able to talk on Tutorial Island; you never were.
[/quote]
I know that you’re not supposed to be able to talk, but I am trying to add something here and in need to be able to talk. Do you have any idea how to change it that you are able to talk at Tutorial Island?[/quote]

Then there would need to be some client-side modifications. Which modifications necessary, is unknown to me.

Read full topic
item.source: Tutorial Island - Not Able to Talk

item.title: Tutorial Island - Not Able to Talk

item.description:
@buut15 wrote:

zyle1992:

It’s in the client. You’re not supposed to be able to talk on Tutorial Island; you never were.

I know that you’re not supposed to be able to talk, but I am trying to add something here and in need to be able to talk. Do you have any idea how to change it that you are able to talk at Tutorial Island?

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Island - Not Able to Talk
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

buut15:

I am making something at Tutorial Island, and every time I talk, no one can see the text. It also will not let you send PM’s. I’ve been trying to fix this for weeks, and can not find it. I have searched every word that could be anywhere close to “tutorial island” in the server and client. Does anyone know how to fix this? I would greatly appreciate this.

It’s in the client. You’re not supposed to be able to talk on Tutorial Island; you never were.

Read full topic
